title: Ep 260 | Jase Teaches His Dog to Call Ducks, the Bacon Cartel, and Late-Night Baptism Stories
description:
Phil and Jase have an update on the latest developments in the case of the Great Cheese Heist. Al is everyone's hookup for the best bacon around. Jase shares a video of how he trained the world's first duck-calling dog. A man lets Jase hunt treasure on his property because he remembers an act of kindness from Phil. The Supreme Court gets one right on religious freedom. And the guys talk about secondhand conversions, authentic worship, the jailer baptized by Paul the Apostle, and the joys and dangers of late-night baptisms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
